name: Undead Farmstead
description:
Defend your farmstead from the zombie horde!

UNDEAD FARMSTEAD is a simple, casual RPG where you work the land at your farmstead like many other games, but with the added threat of zombie attacks.

CONTROLS

> Left click - Move
> Right click - Harvest / plant
> W - Move up
> A - Move left
> S - Move down
> D - Move right

Right click bushes to harvest berries when you are near them.

Left click berries in the bottom toolbar to eat. This increases your health and gives you seeds.

Right click soil in farms to plant seeds.

MOBILE

Please add a comment if you would like the game to be updated to work on mobile.
